Text.val: 11.11.2013 JH SCR18495 Extended long description on form and fixed bug with presenting task title
30.10.2013 GB SCR18467 Added range for PIO.CODX_NUMBERA20
11.09.2012 JH SCR17556 Fixed bug in conditional range
If ModelOfRange = 0 there are not range for CODX_NUMBERA20 and CODX_NUMBERN
If ModelOfRange = 3 then CODX_NUMBERN = CndRange (PIO.CODX_NUMBERN<>0,PIO.CODX_NUMBERN) and
a row exists in the EUCI
